subject: Soccer
Bribery and Kickbacks
lead_paragraph: Mr. Warner, a former vice president of soccer’s governing body and a central figure in its scandal, vowed on Wednesday to reveal all he knows about Sepp Blatter and corruption within the organization.
snippet: Mr. Warner, a former vice president of soccer’s governing body and a central figure in its scandal, vowed on Wednesday to reveal all he knows about Sepp Blatter and corruption within the organization.
